root.name: Crasher
root.description: PC System RequirementsMinimum: OS: Windows® XP /Windows Vista®/Windows 7® Processor: Intel Pentium™ 4 3.0 Ghz or AMD Athlon™ 3200 or higherMemory: 2GB Windows® XP / 3 GB Windows Vista® - Windows 7®Graphics: 256MB NVIDIA® GeForce® 8600GT / ATI Radeon® X1950Pro or higherDirectX®: DirectX 9.0cHard Drive: 2 GB free spaceSound: DirectX 9.0c-compliant sound cardOther: Internet broadband connection required Recommended:OS: Windows® XP /Windows Vista®/Windows 7®Processor: Intel Core® 2 Duo E6600 or AMD Phenom™ X3 8750 or higherMemory: 2GB Windows® XP / 3 GB Windows Vista® - Windows 7®Graphics: 512MB NVIDIA® GeForce® 8800GT / ATI Radeon® HD 3870 or higherDirectX®: DirectX 9.0cHard Drive: 2 GB free spaceSound: DirectX 9.0c-compliant sound cardOther: Internet broadband connection required Mac System RequirementsMinimumOS: OS X version Snow Leopard 10.6.3, or later.Processor: Intel Mac (2.0 GHz)Memory: 3 GB RAMGraphics: 512 MB VRAMHard Drive: 2 GB HD space availableOther: Internet connection requiredPeripherals: Mouse, Keyboard RecommendedOS: OS X version Snow Leopard 10.6.3, or later.Processor: Multi-Core CPUMemory: 4 GB RAMGraphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® 8800GTX / ATI Radeon® HD 5750 or higher with 512 MB video memoryHard Drive: 2 GB HD space availableOther: Internet connection requiredPeripherals: Mouse, Keyboard
